description: A lovely area with a fantastic view. Flowers bloom in profusion around fresh springs. Grass-type Pokemon will adore it!
This area, deep among the craggy mountains, is a gathering spot for physically tough Pokemon.
A small pond with a turtle-shell pattern. Pokemon that gather here love to play in the water and rest on the island.
Mist-Rise Forest, deep inside the Eastern Forest, looks ideal for many Bug-type Pokemon.
